refnamediv.refpurpose: Decryption of a PKCS7 encrypted smime msg

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function performs decryption of a PKCS7 encrypted smime msg

refsect2.title: encrypted_mail_message
refsect2.para: The text of the encrypted smime message

refsect2.title: recipient_certificate
refsect2.para: The certificate of the recipient (pem format)

refsect2.title: recipient_key
refsect2.para: The private key of recipient matching the recipient_certificate (pem format)

refsect2.title: password_for_the_key
refsect2.para: The secret to open the recipient_key (if key is encrypted)

example.title: Decryption a PKCS7 encrypted smime msg
example.programlisting:
select smime_decrypt (file_to_string ('test.p7m'), file_to_string ('test.pem'), file_to_string ('test.key.pem'), 'secret'); _______________________________________________________________________________ Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
